value:
$WmMPID_夏祭リョウマ,ch05_01_Ryouma_M_summer18,Face|The Kingdom of Hoshido was
founded long ago by one of the First
Dragons, the Dawn Dragon.$k$pEven after the Dawn Dragon left us,
the great Dragon Veins that run
through Hoshido remained.$k$pThis festival is dedicated to our god,
the dragon of Hoshido, and to the
land itself.$k$pThe priestesses and the people dance
with gratitude for the bounty we
receive from our land.$k$p$WmMPID_夏祭エリンシア,ch09_06_Erincia_F_dance18,Face|You can see it in their faces—they
dance with joy.$k$pTaking part in this event is a true
honor. I thank you for the invitation.$k$p$WmMPID_夏祭リョウマ,ch05_01_Ryouma_M_summer18,Face|It is our honor to be your host,
Princess Elincia. Like Hoshido, your
kingdom values peace above all else.$k$p$Sbs3000|It is time we learned of other
kingdoms, and their people as well...$k$pDoing so will help us forge a true
and lasting peace, one desired by
all—$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face_Smile|My, isn't this a quaint little
celebration! And that dancing looks
like such fun...$k$p$WmMPID_夏祭リョウマ,ch05_01_Ryouma_M_summer18,Face|Who are you? And where did—$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_04,0|$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|My name is Loki, dear, and, oh, I do
love a party—especially when I'm
not invited.$k$p

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Emblian forces have infiltrated
Hoshido—right in the middle of
a very sacred festival.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|This doesn't just affect Hoshido.
Guests from other realms have
been invited to the festival, too.$k$pIf we don't keep a tight rein on
this situation, it could easily get
out of hand. Let's hurry.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Of course! And as a bonus—once
we finish the mission, we can enjoy
the celebrations, too!$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Well, well. Look who it is! I was
counting on you to be fashionably
late, but you're early. How gauche.$k$pPrince Ryoma, Princess Elincia...
I'll leave it to you to give them the
warm welcome they deserve.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|My, my... I guess I'll have to put you
two to work again later. The contract
does demand it...$k$p$WmMPID_夏祭リョウマ,ch05_01_Ryouma_M_summer18,Face|Hmph!$k$p$Sbs150|
